Trigger.CUST_DCR_overridden:TriggerText:
-- Created for --SCR 85 -VenkatReddy S - 23-Feb-2012
Begin
 Set_item_Property('Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number',INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
End;

-- Begin Fix - SCR 6193.01 - Eswar KC 
-- Assigning the Primary Focal/secondary focal/Aviation Services to the Newly created DCR number. 
DECLARE
 ln_button NUMBER;
 ls_Assignee VARCHAR2(50);
 ls_supplier VARCHAR2(1);
 lc_Production_Ready_Ind VARCHAR2(1); -- 6451.01
BEGIN
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 02-June-2014 (removed the condition ":SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED'") 
IF :PARAMETER.WORK_TYPE != 'VIEW' THEN
 --Begin Fix SCR 7519.01 -Venkat M --11-JAN-2018
 /*IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' THEN 
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Please enter/select NavDB ID');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF; 
 */
 --End Fix SCR 7519.01 -Venkat M --11-JAN-2018
-- End Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 
 SELECT CASE
 WHEN PRIMARY_FOCAL IS NULL THEN
 CASE
 WHEN SECONDARY_FOCAL IS NULL THEN 
 'AIS'
 ELSE 
 SECONDARY_FOCAL
 END
 ELSE 
 PRIMARY_FOCAL
 END, 
 DATA_SUPPLIER, -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 PRODUCTION_READY_IND -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 INTO ls_Assignee, 
 ls_supplier, -- Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 02-June-2014 
 lc_Production_Ready_Ind -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE navdb_id = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;

 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC2
 IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' AND lc_Production_Ready_Ind = 'N' AND :PARAMETER.P_PROD_READY_IND <> 1 THEN 
 ln_button := display_alert.more_buttons ('S', 'Allow Navdb', 'NavDB '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID||' is NOT Production Ready and is associated with data supplier '''||ls_supplier||'''. Do you still want to continue?', 'Yes', 'No' );
 IF ln_button = 2 THEN 
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 IF ls_supplier IS NULL THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER',INSERT_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER',UPDATE_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF; 
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC

 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID IS NULL THEN --Fix SCR 6271 --Madhu--11-Feb-2014
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER:=ls_supplier;--Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 02-June-2014
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6251.00 - Eswar KC
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := ls_Assignee;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.dcr_number := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section_real := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section;
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'N';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND;
 END IF;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6251.00 - Eswar KC
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY := :global.userid;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ON := sysdate;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY_NAME := get_name(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY);
 -- Begin Fix SCR 6271 --Madhu--11-Feb-2014
 ELSIF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID IS NOT NULL AND :CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID THEN 
 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER:=ls_supplier; --Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 02-June-2014
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := ls_Assignee;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.dcr_number := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section_real := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section;
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'N';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND;
 END IF;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6251.00 - Eswar KC
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY := :global.userid;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ON := sysdate;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY_NAME := get_name(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY);
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;--Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 02-June-2014 
 END IF;

 END IF;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni
 -- Commented out capturing existing NavdbID and added to new PRE-TEXT-ITEM trigger on NavdbID,so that it will capture Navdb of Current DCR being processed correctly.
 -- :CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6330.00 - Harikrishna Chitneni 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 IF ( :SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'INSERT' OR NVL(:CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB, :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID) <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID ) AND 
 display_alert.more_buttons ('S', 'Allow Navdb', 'This Navdb does not exist. Do you still want to continue?', 'Yes', 'No' ) = 2 THEN 
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER',INSERT_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE); -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER',UPDATE_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE); -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID IS NULL THEN
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER := NULL; -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := 'AIS';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.dcr_number := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section_real := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section;
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'N';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND;
 END IF;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY := :global.userid;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ON := sysdate;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY_NAME := get_name(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY);
 -- Begin Fix SCR 6376 -Madhu --23-Jun-2014
 ELSIF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID IS NOT NULL AND :CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID THEN
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER:= NULL;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := 'AIS';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.dcr_number := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section_real := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.qc_section;
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'N';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND;
 END IF;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY := :global.userid;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ON := sysdate;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY_NAME := get_name(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_BY);
 :CONTROL_BLOCK.OLD_NAVDB := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 -- End Fix SCR 6376-Madhu --23-Jun-2014 
 END IF;
 -- End Fix SCR 6271 --Madhu--11-Feb-2014
END;
-- End Fix - SCR 6193.01 - Eswar KC

DECLARE
 LN_CNT NUMBER := 0;
BEGIN
--Begin Fix -SCR 6939--Madhu --14-Mar-2016
IF:SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' AND :PARAMETER.WORK_TYPE != 'VIEW' THEN

 END IF;
END IF;
--End Fix -SCR 6939--Madhu --14-Mar-2016

 IF LN_CNT = 0 THEN
--End Begin Fix SCR 7791 - Venkat M -20-Mar-2018

-- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC
if :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.navdb_id is not null and nvl(:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE,0) is not null then
 populate_def_reason_for_change;
-- Fix - SCR 6273 - HariKrishna - 04-April-2014
-- Updated the code such that Billable_Ind flag setting based on 'DCR reason for change code' happens properly. 
-- Removed condition ":DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number is not null" in main IF clause.
 
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6330 - HariKrishna - 02-June-2014 
-- Added condition to check existence of records with given "Reason for Change" value,before setting the "Chargeable Indicator"
-- To Avoid the ORACLE error ,when RequestType selected as ("Selection" or "V&V M/L")
 IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' AND :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'OPEN' 
 THEN

 DECLARE
 lc_is_chargeable VARCHAR2(1);
 ln_count NUMBER;--Added in SCR 6330 
 BEGIN
 --Added below query in SCR 6330
 SELECT COUNT (*)
 INTO ln_count
 FROM dcr_reason_for_change
 WHERE issue_code_descr = :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d;
 IF ln_count >0 --Added this condition in SCR 6330
 THEN
 SELECT issue_code,is_chargeable
 INTO :data_change_request.reason_for_change, lc_is_chargeable
 FROM dcr_reason_for_change
 WHERE issue_code_descr = :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d;

 IF lc_is_chargeable = 'C' THEN 
 :data_change_request.billable_ind := 'Y';
 ELSE
 :data_change_request.billable_ind := 'N';
 END IF; 
 :data_change_request.billable_ind_d := :data_change_request.billable_ind; 
 
 END IF;
 END;

 END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 6273 - HariKrishna - 04-April-2014 
END IF;
-- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC

-- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 14 Dec 2010
IF :data_change_request.effectivity_cycle IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg ('Please Enter the Effectivity Cycle..!!');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
END IF;
-- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 14 Dec 2010

-- Begin Fix - SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 28 Dec 2010
IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_STATUS = 'OPEN' THEN
 set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D',update_allowed, property_true);
 set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D',insert_allowed, property_true);
 
 if :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D is null then
 list_values;
 end if;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
ELSE
 set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D',update_allowed, property_false);
 set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D',insert_allowed, property_false);
 -- End Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 28 Dec 2010

IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS <> 'QUERY' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_STATUS = 'OPEN' -- Fix - SCR 0085 - Dass - 19-Mar-2012
THEN
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON IS NULL THEN -- Fix - SCR 6958.01 - Eswar KC - 06-Jan-2017
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 28 Dec 2010
 DECLARE
 ln_count NUMBER;
 lc_is_chargeable VARCHAR2(1);
 BEGIN
 SELECT COUNT (*)
 INTO ln_count
 FROM dcr_reason_for_change
 WHERE issue_code_descr = :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d;
 
 IF ln_count = 0
 THEN
 dsp_msg ('To select appropriate code for Reason For Change, please press F9');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 ELSE
 --IF :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d IS NOT NULL THEN
 DECLARE
 lc_is_chargeable VARCHAR2(1); 
 BEGIN
 SELECT issue_code, IS_CHARGEABLE
 INTO :data_change_request.reason_for_change, lc_is_chargeable
 FROM dcr_reason_for_change
 WHERE issue_code_descr = :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE := lc_is_chargeable;
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE = 'CRSC' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER', INSERT_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER', UPDATE_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :PARAMETER.P_CHANGE_DATA_SUPPLIER := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER;
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER', INSERT_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER', UPDATE_ALLOWED , PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF; 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON := NULL; 
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 0;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 --Begin Fix-SCR 6273 - Harikrishna Chitneni --Removed NVL on is_chargeable value . 
 IF lc_is_chargeable = 'C' THEN 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND := 'Y';
 ELSE
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND := 'N';
 END IF; 
 --End Fix-SCR 6273 - Harikrishna Chitneni 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND_D := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND; 
 END;
 --END IF;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 END IF;
 END;
 -- End Fix - SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 28 Dec 2010
 END IF;-- Fix - SCR 6958.01 - Eswar KC - 06-Jan-2017 
END IF;-- Fix - SCR 0085 - Dass - 19-Mar-2012

-- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
DECLARE
ls_Data_Supplier VARCHAR2(1);
ls_Data_Supplier_Prev VARCHAR2(1) := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER;
ln_button NUMBER;
 
BEGIN
 
 SELECT Data_Supplier 
 INTO ls_Data_Supplier
 FROM NavDB
 WHERE NavDB_ID = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NavDB_ID;
 
 IF ls_Data_Supplier <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER THEN
 ln_button := display_alert.more_buttons ('S', 'Change Data Supplier', 'NavDB '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NavDB_ID||' is associated with the Data Supplier '||ls_Data_Supplier||'. Do you still want to continue?', 'Yes', 'No' );
 IF ln_button = 2 THEN 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER := :PARAMETER.P_CHANGE_DATA_SUPPLIER;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE 
 :PARAMETER.P_CHANGE_DATA_SUPPLIER := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER; -- Fix SCR 7754 Venkat M 27-02-2018
 END IF; 
 ELSE
 :PARAMETER.P_CHANGE_DATA_SUPPLIER := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER; -- Fix SCR 7754 Venkat M 27-02-2018 
 END IF;

 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
END;
-- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC

--Begin Fix SCR 7373 --Madhu--27-Feb-2017 
DECLARE
 lc_billable_chg_reason data_change_request.billable_chg_reason%type;
BEGIN
 
 SELECT billable_chg_reason INTO lc_billable_chg_reason
 FROM data_change_request
 WHERE dcr_number = :data_change_request.dcr_number;
 -- FIX SCR 05621- Ashish N - 14-May-20
 IF ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE = 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'Y' ) 
 OR ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE <> 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'N' ) THEN 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON := '';
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 0;
 --END -- FIX SCR 05621- Ashish N - 14-May-20
 ELSE
 IF lc_billable_chg_reason IS NOT NULL THEN -- FIX SCR 05621- Ashish N - 12-May-20
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 --End Fix SCR 7373 --Madhu--27-Feb-2017
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 ELSIF ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE = 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'N' ) 
 OR ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE <> 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'Y' ) THEN
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 1;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON := '';
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 0;
 END IF; 
 END IF;
--Begin Fix SCR 7373 --Madhu--27-Feb-2017
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN no_data_found THEN
 IF ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE = 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'N' ) 
 OR ( :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE <> 'C' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND = 'Y' ) THEN
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 1;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', ENABLED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON := '';
 :PARAMETER.BILLABLE := 0;
 END IF;
END;
--End Fix SCR 7373 --Madhu--27-Feb-2017

IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND_D <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_IND THEN

-- Created for --SCR 85 -VenkatReddy S - 23-Feb-2012
Begin
 Set_item_Property('Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number',INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
End;

IF :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'CLOSE' THEN
 DECLARE
 v_status VARCHAR2 (10) := 'CLOSE';
 ln_QC_status NUMBER := 0; -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 ln_QC_Rel NUMBER := 0; -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 lc_data_Supp VARCHAR2 (1); -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 ls_Data_cycle NUMBER; -- 65036
 ls_cnt NUMBER; -- Fix SCR 6111- Ashish N- 11-Jan-21
 ln_attach_cnt NUMBER;
 BEGIN 
 SELECT max(cycle) INTO ls_Data_cycle
 FROM source_data_status
 WHERE data_supplier = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER
 AND package_name = 'DATA_UTILITY'
 AND process_name = 'COPY TAILORED DATA';
 
 --Begin SCR 6111 - Ashish N - 04-JAN-21 
 SELECT count(*) into ls_cnt
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE navdb_id = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 IF ls_cnt = 0 THEN 
 Dsp_Msg('DCR Associated with non-existent NavDB'||' '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID ||' '||'- Please contact CorePT to close DCR');
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_STATUS := 'OPEN';
 Raise form_trigger_failure;
 ELSE
 NULL;
 END IF;
 --End SCR 6111 - Ashish N - 04-JAN-21
 check_attachment_fun(:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_NUMBER,'D'); --Fix SCR 7889 --Madhu
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID NOT IN ('CPT','HON') THEN -- SCR 7051.01- Ashish N - 12-06-2016
 SELECT Data_Supplier INTO lc_data_Supp FROM NavDB WHERE NavDB_ID = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 END IF;
 IF NVL(lc_data_Supp,'$') <> NVL(:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER,'$') THEN -- SCR 7051.01- Ashish N - 12-06-2016
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_STATUS := 'OPEN';
 Dsp_Msg(:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID ||' is associated with the Data Supplier '''||lc_data_Supp||''', not with the Data Supplier '''||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER||'''. Please correct it before closing.');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 ELSE
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 GO_BLOCK ('DCR_ASSIGNMENT');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 -- 
 LOOP
 IF :dcr_assignment.qc_section != '3' THEN
 v_status := 'OPEN';
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 IF :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD != 'TRUE' THEN
 NEXT_RECORD;
 ELSE
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 --
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 IF v_status = 'CLOSE' THEN 
 GO_BLOCK ('DCR_ASSIGNMENT');
 FIRST_RECORD;
 LOOP
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' AND NVL(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_STATUS,'$$$$') != 'QC Passed' THEN
 ln_QC_status := 1;
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 IF :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD != 'TRUE' THEN
 NEXT_RECORD;
 ELSE
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
 --
 IF v_status = 'CLOSE' AND ln_QC_status = 0 THEN
 GO_BLOCK ('DCR_ATTACHMENT');
 FIRST_RECORD; 
 LOOP
 IF :DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_RELEVANT_IND = 'Y' AND :DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_UPDATED_BY IS NULL THEN
 ln_QC_Rel := 1;
 EXIT;
 ELSE
 IF :SYSTEM.LAST_RECORD != 'TRUE' THEN
 NEXT_RECORD;
 ELSE
 EXIT;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP; 
 END IF; 
 --
 IF v_status = 'OPEN' OR ln_QC_status = 1 OR ln_QC_Rel = 1 THEN
 :data_change_request.dcr_status := 'OPEN';
 dsp_msg('DCR can only be closed when all assignments are finally approved and QC(s) is/are in Passed state and all attachments which are QC-Relevant must have been opened [during QC].');
 --Begin Fix SCR 7065 --Madhu -31-Mar-2017
 ELSIF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_REVIEW = 'REQUIRED' THEN
 :data_change_request.dcr_status := 'OPEN';
 dsp_msg('DCR can be closed only when Final Review is Completed or Blank');
 ELSIF ls_Data_cycle > :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE THEN --65036
 --dsp_msg('DCR for cycle '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE||' is closed after '||ls_Data_cycle||' cycle Tailored data is copied.');
 display_alert.one_button('S','DCR Close Alert',
 'DCR for cycle '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE||' is closed after '||ls_Data_cycle||' cycle Tailored data is copied. Please copy '||:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE||' cycle tailored data to upcoming cycle. '); 

 END IF;
 --Fix Fix SCR 7065 --Madhu -31-Mar-2017
 -- 
 GO_BLOCK ('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST');
 -- End Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 END IF; /* IF lc_data_Supp <> :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER THEN */ -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 END; /* End of BEGIN */
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CLOSED_BY', visible, property_false);
 END IF; /* IF :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'CLOSE' THEN */

 IF :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'CLOSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CLOSED_BY', visible, property_true);
 BEGIN
 SELECT first_name || ' ' || last_name
 INTO :data_change_request.closed_by
 FROM corept_user
 WHERE logon_id = :GLOBAL.userid;
 :data_change_request.closed_on := SYSDATE; -- Eswar KC - SCR 4407 - 15-July-2010
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 :navdb_dcr.dcr_status := :data_change_request.dcr_status;
 :navdb_dcr.closed_by := :data_change_request.closed_by;
 :navdb_dcr.closed_on := :data_change_request.closed_on;
 ELSE
 -- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC
 :navdb_dcr.dcr_status := :data_change_request.dcr_status;
 :navdb_dcr.closed_by := '';
 :navdb_dcr.closed_on := '';
 -- SCR 4878 - Eswar KC

 --

else

 END IF;
 CLOSE DCR_ASSIGNMENT_cur;
 END;
 --
 if :navdb_dcr.navdb_id is not null then
 go_block('NAVDB_DCR');
 delete_record;
 commit_form; 
 end if; 
 go_block('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST');
 delete_record;
 commit_form;
 message('Changes saved successfully');-- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -18-Apr-2012
end if;

 End If;

 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'Y';
 dsp_msg('An finished assignment can not be unaccepted.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if; 
-- 
if nvl(upper(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID),'-') != upper(:global.userid) then
 if :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' then
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'N';
 elsif :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'N' then
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'Y';
 end if;
 dsp_msg('An assignment can not be accepted/unaccepted by any person other than the assignee.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
end if;

if :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' and :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID != 'AIS' then
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_UPDATE := sysdate; -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 declare
 cur_record varchar2(50) := :system.cursor_record;
 begin 
 while :system.trigger_record > 1 loop
 previous_record;
 if :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND = 'Y' then
 exit;
 end if;
 if :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID = 'AIS' then
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND := 'Y';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := 'Y';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION := '3';
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_UPDATE := sysdate; 
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION_REAL := '3';
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;
 go_record(cur_record);
 end;
end if;
if nvl(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL,'-') != :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND then
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND;
end if;

 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 end if;
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ASSIGNEE is null THEN 
 dsp_msg('QC Status can not be updated without QC Assignee.'); 
 ELSE

DECLARE
 ln_cycle PL_TLD_AIRPORT.PROCESSING_CYCLE%type;
 ln_upcoming_cycle PL_TLD_AIRPORT.PROCESSING_CYCLE%type;
BEGIN

 SELECT NVL(MAX(processing_cycle),:control_block.temp_cycle) INTO ln_cycle
 FROM pl_std_airport
 WHERE data_supplier = :search_by_navdb_assignee.data_supplier; 

 ln_upcoming_cycle:=Get_Future_Cycle_Fun(ln_cycle); 
 
 IF :search_by_navdb_assignee.effectivity_cycle > ln_upcoming_cycle THEN
 Set_Item_Instance_Property('SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'FUTURE_CYCLE'); 
 Set_Item_Instance_Property('SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE',CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'FUTURE_CYCLE'); 
 
 END IF; 
 
END;
--End Fix SCR 7425 --Madhu --16-Aug-2017

IF :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT FMS_ID INTO :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID FROM
 (SELECT FMS_ID, APPROVED_ON,ROWNUM RN
 FROM GENERATED_NAVDB
 WHERE NAVDB_ID = :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID
 AND APPROVED_BY_PRODUCTION = 'Y'
 AND CYCLE = :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE
 ORDER BY APPROVED_ON DESC) A
 WHERE A.RN = 1;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN --Start of changes for Fix SCR -07698 -Priyanka
 IF :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.DCR_OVERALL_STATUS='CLOSE' THEN
 :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID := NULL;
 ELSE
 BEGIN 
 SELECT FMS_ID INTO :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE NAVDB_ID = :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID := NULL;
 END; 
 END IF; --End of changes for Fix SCR -07698 -Priyanka
 WHEN OTHERS THEN 
 BEGIN 
 SELECT FMS_ID INTO :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE NAVDB_ID = :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID := NULL;
 END; 
 END;
 ELSE 
 BEGIN
 SELECT FMS_ID INTO :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE NAVDB_ID = :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.NAVDB_ID;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :SEARCH_BY_NAVDB_ASSIGNEE.FMS_ID := NULL;
 END; 
 END IF; 
END IF;

 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 ELSE
 DO_KEY('exit_form');
 END IF;
END IF;

--Begin Fix SCR 6157
 
IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' THEN 
 
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Please enter/select NavDB ID');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;

 IF :Data_Change_Request.Effectivity_Cycle IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Please enter/select Effectivity Cycle');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;

 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REQUEST_TYPE IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Please enter/select Request Type');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;

 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE_D IS NULL THEN
 dsp_msg('Please enter/select Request For Change');
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;

 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.SELECTION_CRITERIA_UPDATE = 'N' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.PROCEDURE_UPDATE = 'N' AND
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.FIXES = 'N' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.COMPANY_ROUTE_UPDATE = 'N' AND
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.OTHERS = 'N' 
 THEN
 DSP_MSG('Please Select at least one Data Type.');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
 
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CHANGE_DESCR IS NULL AND :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION <> 0 THEN -- 0 means 'Not Ready'
 DSP_MSG('Please Provide Change Description.');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ACTIONS',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ACTIONS IS NULL THEN 
 display_alert.one_button('S','Review Actions','Actions cannot be blank when Final Review is not blank');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 if display_alert.more_buttons('S','ASK COMMIT',
 'Do you want to save the changes? '||chr(10)||' ',
 'Save', 'Cancel') = 1 then
 --exit_form(DO_COMMIT);
 commit_form; 
 IF :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR = 1 THEN 
 Forms_Utilities.Copy_DCR_Attachments_Prc(:PARAMETER.P_DCR_NUMBER,:parameter.P_COPY_DCR_TEMP,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR := 0;
 END IF;
 ELSE
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE; -- Fix SCR 7889 --Madhu 
 END IF;
END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 6157
-- Begin Fix - SCR 7594.01 -- Venkat M -- 28-sep-1017
:PARAMETER.P_DCR_PREV := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_NUMBER; 
:PARAMETER.P_NEW_DCR := 0; -- SCR 4605 - Shrikant K - 10-Oct-2019
DEL_DCR_ATTCH_LOCAL_COPY; 
-- End Fix - SCR 7594.01 -- Venkat M -- 28-sep-1017

-- Begin Fix - SCR 3239 - Sesha - 16-July-2008
:parameter.p_dcr_number:=:data_change_request.dcr_number;
check_attachment_fun(:PARAMETER.P_DCR_NUMBER,'C'); --Fix SCR 7889 --Madhu

declare
 v_dcr_number number;
 
 ls_supp VARCHAR2(2);--Fix SCR 7163--Madhu
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC -- Uncommented the existing cursor to copy the dcr_attachment details while using Copy DCR button.
 ln_Button NUMBER := 0; 
 CURSOR c1
 IS SELECT attachment_number, attachment_file, attachment_file_name, qc_relevant_ind
 FROM dcr_attachment
 WHERE dcr_number = :parameter.p_dcr_number;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 
 /*cursor c2 is 
 select assignee_logon_id
 from dcr_assignment
 where dcr_number=:parameter.p_dcr_number;*/
 ls_supplier NAVDB.DATA_SUPPLIER%TYPE; --Fix SCR 7754.00 Venkat M --26-Feb-2018
begin
 if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :system.form_status in ('QUERY','NEW') 
 and nvl(:NAVDB_DCR.DCR_STATUS,'OPEN') = 'CLOSE' then
 set_block_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST',update_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST',insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ASSIGNMENT',update_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ASSIGNMENT',insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',delete_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',insert_allowed, property_true);
 set_block_property('NAVDB_DCR',insert_allowed, property_true); -- SCR 04605
 set_block_property('NAVDB_DCR',update_allowed, property_true); -- SCR 04605
 set_item_property('ATTACH.ATTACH',enabled, property_true);
 end if;

 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 IF :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_NUMBER IS NOT NULL THEN
 ln_Button := Display_Alert.More_Buttons ('S', 'Copy Attachment', 'Do you want to Copy Attachment(s)?', 'Yes', 'No');
 END IF; 
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 
 go_block('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST');
 --set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REQUEST_TYPE',ITEM_IS_VALID,PROPERTY_FALSE);--Fix SCR 7514 09-FEB-2018 --SCR 7791 20-mar-2018 - commented
 create_record; 
 duplicate_record;
 /* commented the code for SCR 06667
 Begin Fix SCR 4291.01 Ashwin Valluri --25-Apr-2019
 IF :data_change_request.request_type IN ('001', '002', '003') AND :data_change_request.reason_for_change NOT IN ('TDC', 'CNLD') THEN
 POPULATE_REASON_FOR_CHNG_COPY; 
 ELSIF :data_change_request.request_type IN ('Selection', 'V&V M/L')THEN
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change := NULL;
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d := NULL; 
 END IF; 
 --End Fix SCR 4291.01 Ashwin Valluri --25-Apr-2019*/
 --Begin Fix SCR 7754.00 Venkat M --26-Feb-2018 
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER IS NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT DATA_SUPPLIER
 INTO ls_supplier
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE navdb_id = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;

 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER := NULL;
 END;
 
 IF ls_supplier IS NOT NULL THEN
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER :=ls_supplier; 
 END IF; 
 END IF;
 --End Fix SCR 7754.00 Venkat M --26-Feb-2018
 
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.FINDINGS := 'N';-- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
--Begin Fix SCR 7434

--End Fix SCR 7434

 select DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST_SEQ.nextval into v_dcr_number from dual;

 :data_change_request.dcr_number := v_dcr_number;
 :data_change_request.DCR_STATUS:='OPEN';
 :parameter.P_COPY_DCR_TEMP:=:data_change_request.dcr_number;
 
 set_item_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CLOSED_BY',visible,property_false);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ACTIONS', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- 7434
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_NAME', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- 7434
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ON', VISIBLE, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- 7434
 
 go_block('NAVDB_DCR');
 clear_block(no_validate);
 
 select v_dcr_number,navdb_id
 into :navdb_dcr.dcr_number,:navdb_dcr.navdb_id
 from navdb_dcr
 where dcr_number=:parameter.p_dcr_number;

 :NAVDB_DCR.CREATED_BY := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CREATED_BY; -- Eswar KC - SCR 4407 - 15-July-2010
 :NAVDB_DCR.CREATED_ON := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CREATED_ON; -- Eswar KC - SCR 4407 - 15-July-2010 
 
-- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC

 SELECT IS_CHARGEABLE

EXCEPTION

 :PARAMETER.P_IS_CHARGEABLE := 'Y';
END; 
 GO_BLOCK ('DCR_ATTACHMENT');

 IF ln_Button = 1 THEN
 FOR k IN c1 LOOP
 :dcr_attachment.dcr_number := v_dcr_number;
 :dcr_attachment.attachment_number := k.attachment_number;
 --:dcr_attachment.attachment_file:=k.attachment_file;

 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_RELEVANT_IND := k.qc_relevant_ind; -- Fix - SCR 6679 and SCR 6680 - Eswar KC - 05-May-2015
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.CREATED_BY := USER; -- Ashish N - SCR 7165 - 31-Sep-2017
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.CREATED_ON := SYSDATE; -- Ashish N - SCR 7165 - 31-Sep-2017
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 FIRST_RECORD;
 :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR := 1;
 ELSE
 :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR := 0;
 END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 
 go_block('DCR_ASSIGNMENT');
 clear_block(no_validate);
 hide_view('DCR_ATTACH'); -- Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6273 - Harikrishna Chitneni
 --Added Below query as part of SCR 6273 to derive the default Assignee.By Harikrishna Ch
 --By Default it will be Assigned to first non blank value from either of Primary Focal/Secondary Focal/'Aviation Services'. 
-- Fix Start SCR 06667 - Ashish N - 18-Nov-2022 
 DECLARE
 v_dcr_count NUMBER;
 v_dcr_numner number;
 v_assignee_logon_id VARCHAR2(30);
 CURSOR C2 IS SELECT ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID FROM Dcr_Assignment WHERE dcr_number = :parameter.p_dcr_prev;
 BEGIN
 SELECT count(*) INTO v_dcr_count FROM Dcr_Assignment 
 WHERE dcr_number = :parameter.p_dcr_prev;
 
 IF v_dcr_count = 1 THEN
 SELECT DISTINCT DCR_number, assignee_logon_id INTO v_dcr_number, v_assignee_logon_id FROM Dcr_Assignment 
 WHERE dcr_number = :parameter.p_dcr_prev;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := v_assignee_logon_id;
 ELSE 
 For DCR_ASSIGNEE IN C2 
 LOOP
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := DCR_ASSIGNEE.assignee_logon_id;
 NEXT_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 FIRST_RECORD;
 END IF; 
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := 'AIS';
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := 'AIS'; 
 END;
 -- Fix END SCR 06667 - Ashish N - 18-Nov-2022

 SELECT CASE
 WHEN NVL(primary_focal,secondary_focal) IS NULL 
 THEN 'AIS'

 INTO :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID

 EXCEPTION --Fix SCR 7163 --Madhu-- Added Exception block
 WHEN no_data_found THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID := 'AIS';
 END;/*
-- End Fix - SCR 6273 - Harikrishna Chitneni 

 /*
 for j in c2 loop 
 :dcr_assignment.dcr_number := v_dcr_number;
 :dcr_assignment.assigned_on := sysdate;

 next_record;
 end loop;
 first_record;
 */

 end;

Trigger.CUST_DCR_inherited_overridden:TriggerTex:
declare
 total_rows number;
 V_BUTTON NUMBER(1);
begin
 if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
 dsp_msg('There is changes in the form, please do commit first.');
 else 
 total_rows := get_group_row_count(find_group('Refresh_Records_Group'));
 v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record',
 'You have modified or inserted or deleted '||total_rows||' record(s). '||chr(10)||
 'Do you want to refresh the Master Library now?'||chr(10)||chr(10),
 'Refresh', 'Cancel');
 if v_button = 1 then
 refresh_master_library.refresh_records(total_rows);
 else
 null;
 end if;
 end if; 
end;

PACKAGE BODY PKG_TRANSFERTS IS

-------------------------------------------------
-- Created By VenkatReddy S for DCR Attachments
-- Client to DB --
-------------------------------------------------
FUNCTION Client_To_DB
 ( 
 clientFile in VARCHAR2, 
 tableName in VARCHAR2, 
 columnName in VARCHAR2,
 whereClause in VARCHAR2,
 asynchronous in BOOLEAN default FALSE,
 callbackTrigger in VARCHAR2 default NULL
 ) RETURN BOOLEAN
IS
 LB$Res Boolean ;
 LC$Req Varchar2(256) ;
 LC$Sep Varchar2(1) ;
 LC$Nom Varchar2(100) ;
 ls_ClientFile VARCHAR2(256); -- SCR 7912-9-Aug-2018
BEGIN
-- Begin SCR 7912--DCR Attachment Issue- 9-Aug-2018
 If Substr(clientFile,1,2) = '\\' Or Substr(clientFile,1,1) <> '\' Then
 ls_ClientFile := clientFile;
 ElsIf Substr(clientFile,1,1) = '\' Then
 ls_ClientFile := '\'||clientFile;
 End If; 
-- End SCR 7912--DCR Attachment Issue- 9-Aug-2018 
 LB$Res := Webutil_File_Transfer.Client_To_DB
 ( 
 ls_ClientFile, -- SCR 7912-9-Aug-2018
 tableName, 
 columnName,
 whereClause,
 asynchronous,
 callbackTrigger
 ) ;
 
 Return LB$Res ; 
EXCEPTION -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 Return False;
END Client_To_DB ;

 (

 callbackTrigger
 ) ;

 Return LB$Res ; 
EXCEPTION -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012

 Return False; 
END Client_To_DB_With_Progress ;

PACKAGE BODY PKG_FICHIERS IS
 
-----------------------------------------------------------
-- Created by VenkatReddy S 
-- This function use to select the attachement file path --
----------------------------------------------------------- 
FUNCTION Selection ( PC$Filtre IN Varchar2 DEFAULT '|All files|*.*|' )RETURN VARCHAR2
IS
LC$Path Varchar2(128):=NULL ;
LC$Fichier Varchar2(256) ;
LC$Filtre Varchar2(100) := PC$Filtre ;
--Begin Fix - SCR 5778 -Dass -- 28-Sep-2012
v_cwd_file VARCHAR2(100) := User||'_DCR_ATCH_CWD.txt';
v_FileId Text_IO.file_type;
v_server_loc VARCHAR2 (100);
v_text_file_path VARCHAR2(300); --- Text File's path
Begin
 tool_env.getvar('EXPORT_DATA_PATH',v_text_file_path); 
 v_server_loc := v_text_file_path||'/'||v_cwd_file; 
 Begin
 v_FileId := Text_IO.FOPEN(v_server_loc, 'r'); 
 Exception
 When Others Then
 If Sqlerrm like '%302000%' 
 Then
 v_FileId := Text_IO.FOPEN(v_server_loc, 'w'); 
 End if; 
 End; 
 Begin
 TEXT_IO.GET_LINE(v_FileId, LC$Path);
 Exception
 When No_Data_found
 Then
 Text_IO.fclose(v_FileId);
 End;
 Text_IO.fclose(v_FileId);

 If LC$Path is Null 
 then
 --End Fix - SCR 5778 -Dass -- 28-Sep-2012
 LC$Path := CLIENT_WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Get_Temp_Directory ;
 end if; --Fix - SCR 5778 -Dass -- 28-Sep-2012

 LC$Fichier := WEBUTIL_FILE.FILE_OPEN_DIALOG
 (
 LC$Path,
 '',
 LC$Filtre,
 'Select a file to upload'
 ) ;
 --Begin Fix - SCR 5778 -Dass -- 28-Sep-2012
 If substr(LC$Fichier,1,instr(LC$Fichier,'\',-1,1)) is not null
 Then
 v_FileId := Text_IO.FOPEN(v_server_loc, 'w'); 
 Text_IO.put_line(v_FileId,substr(LC$Fichier,1,instr(LC$Fichier,'\',-1,1))||' '); 
 Text_IO.fclose(v_FileId);
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_STATUS = 'OPEN' THEN
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_UPDATED_BY := NULL; -- Ashish N - SCR 7509 - 14-Jan-2018
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_UPDATED_ON := NULL; -- Ashish N - SCR 7509 - 14-Jan-2018
 Set_Item_instance_Property('DCR_ATTACHMENT.QC_RELEVANT_IND',current_record,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'PLAIN'); -- Ashish N - SCR 7509 - 14-Jan-2018
 ELSE
 NULL;
 END IF; 
 End if;
 --End Fix - SCR 5778 -Dass -- 28-Sep-2012
 Return LC$Fichier ;
 
END Selection ;


END;

PROCEDURE DSP_ERROR(ERR_MSG IN VARCHAR2) IS
 alert_id alert;
 choice number(3);
BEGIN
 set_alert_property('ERROR_MESSAGE', alert_message_text,ERR_MSG); 
 alert_id := find_alert ('ERROR_MESSAGE');
 choice := show_alert(alert_id);
END;

PROCEDURE check_role IS
 v_exist number := 0; 
 v_block varchar2(100);
BEGIN 
 if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
 select count(*) into v_exist
 from corept_user_role 
 where upper(logon_id) = upper(:global.userid) 
 and role_name in ('COREPT_PROD_DATA','COREPT_ADMIN');
 end if;
 --
 if :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' or v_exist = 0 then
 for i in 1..4 loop
 if i = 1 then
 v_block := 'DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST';
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.NEW_DCR',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ---set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.COPY', enabled, PROPERTY_FALSE); -- Begin Fix VenkatReddy S -SCR 85 -02-Mar-2012.---Fix Dass -SCR 156 -26-Jun-2012.
 elsif i = 2 then
 v_block := 'DCR_ATTACHMENT';
 set_item_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACH',ENABLED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 elsif i = 3 then
 v_block := 'DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST';
 elsif i = 4 then
 v_block := 'DCR_ASSIGNMENT';
 end if; 
 set_block_property(v_block,INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_block_property(v_block,UPDATE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 set_block_property(v_block,DELETE_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 end loop;
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',UPDATE_ALLOWED,property_true); -- Otherwise, the attachement is not viewable
 else
 --set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.COPY', enabled, property_true); -- Begin Fix VenkatReddy S -SCR 85 -02-Mar-2012.---Fix Dass -SCR 156 -26-Jun-2012. 
 set_item_property('CONTROL_BLOCK.NEW_DCR',enabled,property_true);
 set_item_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACH',enabled,property_true);
 set_block_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST',DELETE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST',UPDATE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST',INSERT_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',DELETE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',UPDATE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ATTACHMENT',INSERT_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ASSIGNMENT',DELETE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ASSIGNMENT',UPDATE_ALLOWED,property_true);
 set_block_property('DCR_ASSIGNMENT',INSERT_ALLOWED,property_true); 
 end if;
END;

FUNCTION Get_name (p_user_id varchar2) RETURN varchar2 IS
 v_name varchar2(100);
BEGIN
 select FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME
 into v_name
 from corept_user
 where logon_id = p_user_id;
 return v_name;
Exception
 when no_data_found then
 return p_user_id;
END;

Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to COMMIT_FORM the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels COMMIT_FORM dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;
 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

PROCEDURE populate_reason_for_change IS
 lrg_name VARCHAR2 (40) := 'focal';
 lrg_record_grp recordgroup;
 ln_populate_grp NUMBER;
BEGIN
 -- delete the old group
 lrg_record_grp := FIND_GROUP (lrg_name);

 -- create list
 IF ID_NULL (lrg_record_grp) THEN
 lrg_record_grp :=
 CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY
 (lrg_name,
 'SELECT ISSUE_CODE_DESCR, ISSUE_CODE FROM DCR_REASON_FOR_CHANGE ORDER BY 1'
 );
 -- populate the group
 ln_populate_grp := POPULATE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);

 IF ln_populate_grp <> 0 THEN
 dsp_msg ('Populate group had error ' || TO_CHAR (ln_populate_grp));
 END IF;
 -- populate list
 POPULATE_LIST ('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE', lrg_record_grp);
 END IF;
END;
-- End Fix - SCR 4878 - Eswar KC - 14 Dec 2010

PROCEDURE Insert_Attachments IS
 -------------------------------------------------------
 -- Created by VenkatReddy S for DCR_Attachments
 -- Insert Attachment into Blob 
 --------------------------------------------------------
 LN$But Pls_Integer ;
 LB$Res Boolean ;
 LC$Name Varchar2(1000) ;
 LC$Sep Varchar2(1) ;
 LvString Varchar2(1000);
 l_filelen number; --Added for Fix SCR -08175 - Priyanka
Begin
 -- Start Fix - SCR 08175 - Priyanka
 :PARAMETER.P_DCRATTACH_LEN :=NULL;
 Begin
 l_filelen:=Check_FileLength(:DCR_ATTACHMENT.DUMMY_FILE_NAME);
 :PARAMETER.P_DCRATTACH_LEN :=l_filelen;
 IF l_filelen = 0
 THEN
 dsp_msg(' File Size is Zero, Upload Correct File. ');
 clear_record;
 go_block('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 ELSE
 -- End Fix - SCR 08175 - Priyanka
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.CLAUSE_WHERE := (:DCR_ATTACHMENT.CLAUSE_WHERE||' '||'and Attachment_Number ='||:DCR_ATTACHMENT.Attachment_Number);
 If :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME is not null 
 And :DCR_ATTACHMENT.NOM_TABLE is not null
 And :DCR_ATTACHMENT.NOM_COLONNE is not null 
 And :DCR_ATTACHMENT.CLAUSE_WHERE is not null 
 Then
 
 If Upper(:DCR_ATTACHMENT.NOM_TABLE) = 'DCR_ATTACHMENT' Then
 LC$Sep := WEBUTIL_FILE.Get_File_Separator ; -- 10g
 
 If Instr( :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME, LC$Sep ) > 0 Then
 LC$Name := Substr( :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME, instr( :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME, LC$Sep, -1 ) + 1, 128 ) ;
 Else
 LC$Name := :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME ;
 End if ;
 End if ; 
 Begin

 post;--Fix SCR 0146 -- Madhu -- 28-May-2012
 Select 1 Into LN$But From DCR_ATTACHMENT Where Dcr_Number = :Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number and Attachment_Number = to_Char(:Dcr_attachment.Attachment_Number) ;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 Insert into Dcr_attachment(Dcr_Number,Attachment_Number,Created_By,Created_On,Attachment_File_Name) Values (:Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number,:Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_Number,:Dcr_Attachment.Created_By,:Dcr_attachment.Created_On,:Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_File_Name);
 End ;

 If :DCR_ATTACHMENT.CB_PROGRESS = 'N' Then 
 If Not PKG_TRANSFERTS.Client_To_DB
 (
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.DUMMY_FILE_NAME,--Fix SCR 0146 -- Madhu -- 12-June-2012
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.nom_table,
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.nom_colonne,
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.clause_Where
 ) Then
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', TITLE, 'Client to DB' ) ; --- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Error uploading / saving ''' --Fix Ayodya --SCR 5745 05-09-2012 --Changed the message text 
 || :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME||'''' ) ; -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'ERROR_MESSAGE' ) ; -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012 

 --Begin fix ayodya --SCR 5745 06-09-2012
 IF :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME := '';
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_NUMBER := '';
 
 END IF;
 --End fix ayodya --SCR 5745 06-09-2012
 Else
 --Clear_Message ;
--Begin Fix SCR 7609.01 --Madhu --23-NOV-2017
 IF :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'OPEN' THEN
 GO_BLOCK('DCR_ASSIGNMENT');
 first_record;
 LOOP
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION <> 0 THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION_REAL := 0;
 END IF;
 EXIT WHEN :system.last_record = 'TRUE';
 next_record;
 END LOOP;
 END IF;
--End Fix SCR 7609.01 --Madhu --23-NOV-2017
 commit_form;
 check_attachment_fun(:Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number,'I'); --Fix SCR 7889 --Madhu
 message('File Uploaded Successfully');
 -- SCR 4568 -- Venkat M 22-FEB-2018 -- Revert back changes of SCR 7868.01
 /*--Begin Fix SCR 7868.01 --Ashwin --17-JAN-2019
 IF :data_change_request.dcr_status = 'OPEN' AND
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_STATUS = 'QC Passed' THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION := 0;
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_STATUS := 'REDO QC'; 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
 --End Fix SCR 7868.01 --Ashwin --17-JAN-2019*/
 END IF; 
 
 Else
 If Not PKG_TRANSFERTS.Client_To_DB_With_Progress
 ( 
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.DUMMY_FILE_NAME,--Fix SCR 0146 -- Madhu -- 12-June-2012
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.nom_table,
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.nom_colonne,
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.clause_Where,
 'Transfer Client -> BD',
 '>> ' || :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME
 ) Then
 
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', TITLE, 'Client to DB' ) ; -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Error uploading / saving ''' --Fix Ayodya --SCR 5745 05-09-2012 --changed the message text 
 || :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME||'''' ) ; -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'ERROR_MESSAGE' ) ; -- Fix Dass -SCR 85 -03-Apr-2012 
 
 --Begin fix ayodya --SCR 5745 06-09-2012
 IF :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME := '';
 :DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_NUMBER := '';
 END IF;
 --End fix ayodya --SCR 5745 06-09-2012
 
 Else
 Clear_Message ;
 End if ;
 
 End if ;
 
 Else
 Set_Alert_Property( 'WARNING', TITLE, 'DB vers Client' ) ;
 Set_Alert_Property( 'WARNING', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'A source file name must be entered ' ) ;
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'WARNING' ) ; 
 
 End if ;
 END IF; -- Added for Fix - SCR 08175
 END; -- Added for Fix - SCR 08175
 --Clear_Record ;
 Go_Block( 'DCR_ATTACHMENT' ) ;
 first_record;
 --Post;

 --Execute_Query ;

Exception
 When others then
 Message(dbms_error_text, acknowledge); 
End ;

PROCEDURE open_attachments IS
 -------------------------------------------------------
 -- Created by VenkatReddy S for DCR_Attachments
 -- Open a stored document --
 ------------------------------------------------------
 LC$Cmd Varchar2(1000);
 LC$Nom Varchar2(1000);
 LC$Fic Varchar2(1000);
 LC$Path Varchar2(1000);
 LC$Sep Varchar2(1) ;
 LN$But Pls_Integer ;
 LB$Ok Boolean ;
 LS_Dcr_Number Varchar2(256);
 -- Current Process ID --
 --ret WEBUTIL_HOST.PROCESS_ID ;
 --ret web.PROCESS_ID ;
 LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS Boolean; --Fix SCR 7838.01 --Venkat M 18-Jan-2019
Begin

 -------------------------------
 -- Local temporary file name --
 -------------------------------
 LC$Sep := WEBUTIL_FILE.Get_File_Separator ; -- 10g
 LC$Nom := Substr( :Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_File_Name, instr( :Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_File_Name, LC$Sep, -1 ) + 1, 100 ) ;
 LC$Nom := regexp_replace(replace(LC$Nom,substr(LC$Nom,instr(LC$Nom,'.',-1)),:Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number||:Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_Number||substr(LC$Nom,instr(LC$Nom,'.',-1))),'[^a-zA-Z0-9.]','');--Added by PBommak for Fix SCR 7715
 LC$Path := CLIENT_WIN_API_ENVIRONMENT.Get_Temp_Directory ;
 :PARAMETER.P_DCR_ATCH_TMP_PATH := LC$Path || LC$Sep; --Fix SCR 7594.01 -- Venkat M 27-Sep-2017
 LC$Fic := LC$Path || LC$Sep || LC$Nom ;
 --Begin Fix SCR 7838.01 --Venkat M 18-Jan-2019
 IF WEBUTIL_FILE.FILE_EXISTS(LC$Fic) = TRUE THEN 
 LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS := WEBUTIL_FILE.DELETE_FILE( LC$Fic ) ;
 IF LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS = FALSE THEN
 dsp_msg('Attachment is already open, please verify.');
 END IF;
 END IF;
 IF NVL(LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS,TRUE) <> FALSE THEN
 --End Fix SCR 7838.01 --Venkat M 18-Jan-2019 
 
 ----------------------
 -- File extraction --
 ----------------------
 LS_Dcr_Number := ('DCR_NUMBER = ' || To_Char( :Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number) ||' and Attachment_Number = '||To_Char( :Dcr_Attachment.Attachment_Number));

 If Not PKG_TRANSFERTS.DB_To_Client
 (
 LC$Fic,
 'DCR_ATTACHMENT',
 'ATTACHMENT_FILE',
 LS_Dcr_Number
 ) Then
 
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', TITLE, 'DB to Client' ) ; -- Bigin Fix SCR 5745 Ayodya --05-09-2012--Changed the alert 
 Set_Alert_Property( 'ERROR_MESSAGE', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Error opening attachment' ) ; 
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'ERROR_MESSAGE' ) ; -- End Fix SCR 5745 Ayodya --05-09-2012--Changed the alert 
 Raise Form_trigger_Failure ;

 End if ;

 -----------------------------------
 -- Open the local temporary file --
 -----------------------------------
 LC$Cmd := 'cmd /c start "" /WAIT "' || LC$Fic || '"' ;
 --Ret := WEBUTIL_HOST.blocking( LC$Cmd ) ; -- Fix SCR 7594.01 Venkat M --25-09-2017--commented
 web.show_document('file:\\'||LC$Fic); -- Fix SCR 7635 -- Madhu --12-Oct-2022
 -- Bigin Fix SCR 7594.01 Venkat M --25-sep-2017 --code commented
 /*LN$But := WEBUTIL_HOST.Get_return_Code( Ret ) ;
 If LN$But <> 0 Then
 Set_Alert_Property( 'WARNING', TITLE, 'Host() command' ) ;
 Set_Alert_Property( 'WARNING', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Host() command error : ' || To_Char( LN$But ) ) ;
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'WARNING' ) ;
 LB$Ok := WEBUTIL_FILE.DELETE_FILE( LC$Fic ) ;
 Raise Form_Trigger_Failure ;
 End if ;
 */
 ------------------------------------------------
 -- Uncomment Below code Based on requirement.
 -- Re-store the modified file in the database --
 ------------------------------------------------
 /* If Not PKG_TRANSFERTS.Client_To_DB
 (
 LC$Fic,
 'DCR_ATTACHMENT',
 'ATTACHMENT_FILE',
 'DCR_NUMBER = ' || To_Char( :Data_Change_Request.Dcr_Number) 
 ) Then
 
 Set_Alert_Property( 'AL_ERROR', TITLE, 'Client to DB' ) ;
 Set_Alert_Property( 'AL_ERROR', ALERT_MESSAGE_TEXT, 'Error on storing file' ) ;
 LN$But := Show_Alert( 'AL_ERROR' ) ;
 Raise Form_trigger_Failure ;

 Else
 Commit ;
 Clear_Message ;
 Message('File re-stored in the database', no_acknowledge ) ; 
 End if ; */
 
 -------------------------------------
 -- Remove the temporary local file --
 -------------------------------------
 -- Bigin Fix SCR 7594.01 Venkat M --25-sep-2017 --local files deletion logic moved from here
 /*
 LB$Ok := WEBUTIL_FILE.DELETE_FILE( LC$Fic ) ;

 If LB$Ok = FALSE Then
 Bell ;
 Message( 'Error removing local file ', no_acknowledge ) ;
 End if ;
 */
 Clear_Message ; 
 END IF; --End Fix SCR 7838.01 -- Venkat M 18-Jan-2019 
Exception
 When Form_Trigger_Failure Then
 Raise ;
End;

 get_module_information(mname, scr_description, scr_part_number);
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DATE_TIME := to_char(sysdate,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS');
 :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_NAME := mname;

PROCEDURE populate_data_supplier IS
 lrg_record_grp recordgroup;
 ln_populate_grp NUMBER;
 lc_canvas VARCHAR2 (30); 
BEGIN
 -- delete the old group
 lrg_record_grp := FIND_GROUP ('focal');

 IF NOT ID_NULL (lrg_record_grp)
 THEN
 DELETE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 END IF;
 -- create list 
 lrg_record_grp :=
 CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY
 ('focal',
 'Select data_supplier_name,data_supplier from data_supplier order by 1 '
 );

 ln_populate_grp := POPULATE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 
 IF ln_populate_grp <> 0 THEN

 END IF;
 populate_list('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DATA_SUPPLIER',lrg_record_grp);

PROCEDURE populate_original_dcr IS
 lrg_record_grp recordgroup;
 ln_populate_grp NUMBER;
 lc_canvas VARCHAR2 (30); 
 ln_count NUMBER;
BEGIN
 SELECT count(ndcr.dcr_number)
 INTO ln_count
 FROM data_change_request dcr, navdb_dcr ndcr
 WHERE dcr.dcr_number = ndcr.dcr_number
 AND ndcr.navdb_id = :data_change_request.navdb_id
 AND dcr.effectivity_cycle = NVL(:data_change_request.effectivity_cycle, 0)
 AND dcr.request_type = :data_change_request.request_type
 AND :data_change_request.REASON_FOR_CHANGE like 'P%';
 IF ln_count = 1 THEN
 SELECT count(ndcr.dcr_number)
 INTO :data_change_request.ORIGINAL_DCR
 FROM data_change_request dcr, navdb_dcr ndcr
 WHERE dcr.dcr_number = ndcr.dcr_number
 AND ndcr.navdb_id = :data_change_request.navdb_id
 AND dcr.effectivity_cycle = NVL(:data_change_request.effectivity_cycle, 0)
 AND dcr.request_type = :data_change_request.request_type
 AND :data_change_request.REASON_FOR_CHANGE like 'P%';
 ELSIF ln_count > 1 THEN
 -- delete the old group
 lrg_record_grp := FIND_GROUP ('focal');
 
 IF NOT ID_NULL (lrg_record_grp)
 THEN
 DELETE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 END IF;
 -- create list 
 lrg_record_grp :=
 CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY
 ('focal',
 'SELECT ndcr.dcr_number, ndcr.dcr_number FROM data_change_request dcr, navdb_dcr ndcr 
 WHERE dcr.dcr_number = ndcr.dcr_number 
 AND ndcr.navdb_id = :data_change_request.navdb_id
 AND dcr.effectivity_cycle = '||NVL(:data_change_request.effectivity_cycle, 0)||'
 AND dcr.request_type = '||:data_change_request.request_type||'
 ORDER BY 1'
 );

 ln_populate_grp := POPULATE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 
 IF ln_populate_grp <> 0 THEN
 dsp_msg('Populate group had error '||to_char(ln_populate_grp)); 
 END IF;
 populate_list('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.ORIGINAL_DCR',lrg_record_grp);
 END IF;
END;
--AND :data_change_request.REASON_FOR_CHANGE like ''P%''

PROCEDURE populate_user_assignee (p_block in varchar2,p_item in varchar2)
IS
 lrg_record_grp recordgroup;
 ln_populate_grp NUMBER;
 lc_canvas VARCHAR2 (30); 
BEGIN
 -- delete the old group
 lrg_record_grp := FIND_GROUP ('focal');
 IF NOT ID_NULL (lrg_record_grp)
 THEN
 DELETE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 END IF;
 --
 lrg_record_grp := 
 CREATE_GROUP_FROM_QUERY
 ('focal',
 'SELECT DISTINCT rlabel, rvalue
 FROM (SELECT FIRST_NAME || '' '' || LAST_NAME rlabel, LOGON_ID rvalue
 FROM corept_user
 WHERE first_name IS NOT NULL
 AND logon_id IN (SELECT logon_id FROM corept_user_role)
 UNION ALL
 SELECT CU.FIRST_NAME || '' '' || CU.LAST_NAME rlabel,
 CU.LOGON_ID rvalue
 FROM corept_user CU, dcr_assignment DA
 WHERE CU.first_name IS NOT NULL
 AND CU.logon_id = DA.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID
 UNION ALL
 SELECT DISTINCT DA.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID rlabel, DA.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID rvalue
 FROM dcr_assignment DA
 WHERE DA.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID NOT IN (SELECT logon_id FROM corept_user))
 ORDER BY rlabel
 ');
 --
 ln_populate_grp := POPULATE_GROUP (lrg_record_grp);
 IF ln_populate_grp <> 0
 THEN

 POPULATE_LIST (p_block||'.'||p_item, lrg_record_grp);
END ;

-- *********************************************************
 -- Program Unit: POPULATE_DCR_ASSIGNEE
 -- Purpose: This procedure populates Active users as DCR Assignee ,.
 -- When clicked on "Create New DCR" botton or "Insert new record" option on menu bar (plus symbol).
 -- As same logic is being used in both the places,this program unit is created to modularize and added a procedure calls,
 -- under CUST_DCR form 1)WHEN-BUTTON_PRESSED trigger of "Create New DCR" button 2) KEY-CREREC trigger of form level.
 -- Also finetuned the below query to improve the performence.
 -- Analyst: Harikrishna Chitneni
 -- Development Start: 09-June-2014
-- Start Fix - Harikrishna CH -SCR 6357 -09-JUN-2014
PROCEDURE POPULATE_DCR_ASSIGNEE IS
 lrg_RecGroup RECORDGROUP; 
 ln_Num NUMBER;
 ls_Rquery VARCHAR2(600); 
BEGIN 
 -- Check if already group exists with same name and Delete it if yes.
 lrg_RecGroup := Find_Group('assignee'); 
 IF NOT Id_Null(lrg_RecGroup) THEN
 Delete_Group(lrg_RecGroup);
 END IF; 

 lrg_RecGroup := Create_Group_From_Query('assignee','
 SELECT FIRST_NAME||'' ''||LAST_NAME rlabel,LOGON_ID rvalue
 FROM corept_user
 WHERE first_name IS NOT NULL
 AND logon_id IN (SELECT logon_id 
 FROM corept_user_role 
 WHERE role_name IN (''COREPT_PROD_DATA'',''COREPT_ADMIN''))
 AND active_ind = ''Y''
 UNION
 SELECT CU.FIRST_NAME||'' ''||CU.LAST_NAME rlabel,CU.LOGON_ID rvalue
 FROM corept_user CU,dcr_assignment DA
 WHERE CU.first_name IS NOT NULL
 AND CU.logon_id =DA.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID
 AND CU.active_ind = ''Y'''); 

 ln_Num := Populate_Group(lrg_RecGroup); 
 IF ln_Num <> 0 THEN 
 Dsp_Msg('Populate group had error '||TO_CHAR(ln_Num)); 
 END IF;
 Populate_List('DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID',lrg_RecGroup);
 Populate_List('DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ASSIGNEE',lrg_RecGroup); -- Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
END; 
-- End Fix - Harikrishna CH -SCR 6357 -09-JUN-2014

--Begin Fix SCR 7425 --Madhu --16-Aug-2017
FUNCTION Get_Future_Cycle_Fun(p_cycle NUMBER) RETURN NUMBER IS
 CURSOR cycle_cur is
 SELECT cycle
 FROM cycle
 WHERE to_number(substr(to_char(cycle),1,4)) =
 to_number(substr(to_char(p_cycle),1,4)) + 1
 ORDER BY cycle;
 ln_future_cycle PL_TLD_AIRPORT.PROCESSING_CYCLE%type;
BEGIN
 IF TO_NUMBER (SUBSTR (TO_CHAR (p_cycle), 5, 2)) = 13 THEN --Fix SCR 07195- Ashish N- 29-Apr-22
 OPEN cycle_cur;
 FETCH cycle_cur INTO ln_future_cycle;
 CLOSE cycle_cur;
 ELSE
 ln_future_cycle := p_cycle + 1;
 END IF;
 RETURN ln_future_cycle;
END;
--End Fix SCR 7425 --Madhu --16-Aug-2017

--Begin Fix SCR 7594.01 -- Venkat M 27-Sep-2017
PROCEDURE DEL_DCR_ATTCH_LOCAL_COPY IS
 CURSOR CUR_DCR_ATCH IS
 SELECT ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME 
 FROM DCR_ATTACHMENT
 WHERE DCR_NUMBER = :PARAMETER.P_DCR_PREV;
 LS_ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME DCR_ATTACHMENT.ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME%TYPE;
 LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS BOOLEAN;
BEGIN 

 IF :PARAMETER.P_DCR_PREV IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :PARAMETER.P_DCR_ATCH_TMP_PATH IS NOT NULL THEN
 OPEN CUR_DCR_ATCH;
 LOOP 
 FETCH CUR_DCR_ATCH INTO LS_ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME;
 EXIT WHEN CUR_DCR_ATCH%NOTFOUND;
 LS_FILE_DEL_STATUS := WEBUTIL_FILE.DELETE_FILE( :PARAMETER.P_DCR_ATCH_TMP_PATH||LS_ATTACHMENT_FILE_NAME ) ;
 END LOOP; 
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
END;
--End Fix SCR 7594.01 -- Venkat M 27-Sep-2017

--SCR 7514 MVR 14-DEC-2017
FUNCTION CHECK_REASON_FOR_CODE RETURN NUMBER IS
ln_time VARCHAR2(30);
ln_clc_time VARCHAR2(30);
ln_date TIMESTAMP; -- CHECK
ls_User_Location VARCHAR2(1);
ln_cutoff_day TIMESTAMP;
ln_current_cycle NUMBER;
ln_upcoming_cycle NUMBER;
ln_timezone VARCHAR2(10);
ln_exec_loc VARCHAR(1);
ln_len NUMBER;
ln_loc VARCHAR2(1);
ln_hrs NUMBER;
ln_mns NUMBER;
ln_hrs1 NUMBER;
ln_mns1 NUMBER;
ln_hrs2 NUMBER;
ln_mns2 NUMBER;

BEGIN
 -- current cycle for which arinc file is received
 SELECT MAX(processing_cycle)
 INTO ln_current_cycle
 FROM pl_std_airport
 WHERE data_supplier = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.data_supplier; 
 -- AIRAC day 5
 --Fix SCR 05192 Harikrishna Ch 6-Sep-2019 Changed cutoff day calculation to +4 to get 5th day from effective date acurately. 
 SELECT previous_cycle_start_date + 4 
 INTO ln_cutoff_day 
 FROM CYCLE
 WHERE CYCLE = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE; --Fix SCR 7514 - 31-JAN-2018 
 
 ln_upcoming_cycle := Get_Future_Cycle_Fun(ln_current_cycle); --Gives the upcoming cycle

 -- DCR creation date and time
 --SELECT to_date(to_char(current_timestamp,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),to_char(current_timestamp,'HH24:MI') --check Venkat 
 --SELECT to_date(to_char(sysdate,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),to_char(sysdate,'HH:MI AM') --check Venkat on 22-JAN-2018 --final check 06-FEB-2018 
 
 SELECT to_date(to_char(sysdate,'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI'),to_char(sysdate,'HH:MI AM') --check Venkat on 22-JAN-2018 --final check 06-FEB-2018
 INTO ln_date,ln_clc_time
 FROM dual;
 
 /* SELECT LOC --Fix SCR 05192 Harikrishna Ch 6-Sep-2019 commented out this query as this is not being used in logic.
 INTO ln_exec_loc
 FROM COREPT_USER
 WHERE LOGON_ID = user;*/

 -- NavDB Primary focal location 
 /*BEGIN 
 SELECT LOC 
 INTO ln_loc
 FROM NAVDB A, COREPT_USER B 
 WHERE A.PRIMARY_FOCAL = B.LOGON_ID 
 AND A.NAVDB_ID = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 ln_loc := 'P'; -- for blank primary focal defaulted to Phoenix
 END; 

 IF ln_loc = 'H' THEN
 SELECT TZ_OFFSET('Asia/Calcutta') 
 INTO ln_time
 FROM DUAL;
 ELSE*/

 SELECT TZ_OFFSET('US/Arizona') 
 INTO ln_time
 FROM DUAL;

 --END IF;

/* IF ln_exec_loc = ln_loc THEN 
 IF ln_exec_loc = 'H' THEN
 -- current time @phoenix
 ln_hrs := to_number(substr(ln_time,2,2)); 
 ln_mns := to_number(substr(ln_time,5,2)); 
 ln_date := ln_date + (ln_hrs/24 + ln_mns/(24*60));
 ELSE
 ln_hrs := to_number(substr(ln_time,2,2)); 
 ln_mns := to_number(substr(ln_time,5,2)); 
 ln_date := ln_date - (ln_hrs/24 + ln_mns/(24*60)); 
 END IF; 
 ELSE --> NOT equal
 IF ln_exec_loc = 'H' THEN
 ln_hrs := to_number(substr(ln_time,2,2)); 
 ln_mns := to_number(substr(ln_time,5,2)); 
 ln_date := ln_date - (ln_hrs/24 + ln_mns/(24*60)); 
 ELSE
 ln_hrs := to_number(substr(ln_time,2,2)); 
 ln_mns := to_number(substr(ln_time,5,2)); 
 ln_date := ln_date + (ln_hrs/24 + ln_mns/(24*60)); 
 END IF; 
 END IF; */

 ln_hrs := to_number(substr(ln_time,2,2)); 
 ln_mns := to_number(substr(ln_time,5,2)); 
 ln_date := ln_date - (ln_hrs/24 + ln_mns/(24*60)); 
 
 --Fix SCR 05192 Harikrishna Ch 6-Sep-2019 
IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE IN (ln_current_cycle,ln_upcoming_cycle) THEN 
 
 IF :data_change_request.request_type = '001' and to_date(to_char(ln_date,'DD-MM-YYYY'),'DD-MM-YYYY') > to_date(to_char(ln_cutoff_day,'DD-MM-YYYY'),'DD-MM-YYYY') THEN
 :PARAMETER.REASON_CD_CCR := 0;
 return 0; 
 
 ELSIF :data_change_request.request_type = '001' and to_date(to_char(ln_date,'DD-MM-YYYY'),'DD-MM-YYYY') < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ln_cutoff_day,'DD-MM-YYYY'),'DD-MM-YYYY') THEN
 :PARAMETER.REASON_CD_CCR := 1;
 return 1;
 ELSE
 :PARAMETER.REASON_CD_CCR := 1;
 return 1; 
 END IF;
ELSE 
 :PARAMETER.REASON_CD_CCR := 1;
 return 1;
END IF; 
END;
 --Fix SCR 05192 Harikrishna Ch 6-Sep-2019

-- Begin Fix SCR 7791 - Venkat M - 21-Mar-2018
PROCEDURE POPULATE_REASON_FOR_CHNG_COPY IS
 ln_cycle NUMBER(6);
 ls_cut_off_date VARCHAR2(6);
 ls_cut_off_date_d VARCHAR2(15);
 ld_date DATE;
 v_button NUMBER;
 ln_count NUMBER;
BEGIN
-- Auto Populate of Reason for Change
 IF :data_change_request.navdb_id IS NOT NULL
 AND NVL (:data_change_request.effectivity_cycle, 0) IS NOT NULL
 AND :data_change_request.dcr_number IS NOT NULL
 THEN
 IF :data_change_request.request_type IN ('001', '002', '003')
 THEN
 :PARAMETER.CHK_REASON_CD := CHECK_REASON_FOR_CODE; 
 IF :data_change_request.request_type = '001' AND :PARAMETER.CHK_REASON_CD = 0
 THEN
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change := 'CRAC';
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d := 'CRAC-Cust Request After Cut-Off Date'; 
 ELSE
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change := 'CCR';
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d := 'CCR-Customer Request'; 
 END IF;
 ELSIF :data_change_request.request_type IN ('Selection', 'V&V M/L')
 THEN
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change := NULL;
 :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d := NULL; 
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;
-- End Fix SCR 7791 - Venkat M - 21-Mar-2018

-- SCR 4605 - Shrikant K - 10-Oct- 2019

PROCEDURE check_attachment_fun(pn_DCR_NUMBER NUMBER,p_copy_close VARCHAR2) IS
ln_cnt NUMBER;
ln_attach_num NUMBER;
ln_attachment VARCHAR2(10);
BEGIN
 select count(*) INTO ln_cnt from dcr_attachment
 where ATTACHMENT_FILE is null
 and DCR_NUMBER = pn_DCR_NUMBER;
 
 IF ln_cnt > 0 THEN
 for x in (select attachment_number from dcr_attachment
 where ATTACHMENT_FILE is null
 and DCR_NUMBER = pn_DCR_NUMBER) Loop
 ln_attachment := ln_attachment||','||x.attachment_number; 
 end loop; 
 ln_attachment := rtrim(ltrim(ln_attachment,','),',');
 IF p_copy_close = 'C' THEN
 dsp_msg('Attachment(s)# '||ln_attachment||' of DCR# '||pn_DCR_NUMBER||' is incorrect. Please re-check before copying');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSIF p_copy_close = 'I' THEN
 dsp_msg('Attachment(s)# '||ln_attachment||' of DCR# '||pn_DCR_NUMBER||' is incorrect. Please re-attach before saving');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 dsp_msg('Attachment(s)# '||ln_attachment||' of DCR# '||pn_DCR_NUMBER||' is incorrect. Please re-check before closing');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

FUNCTION Check_FileLength(p_ClientFile IN VARCHAR2) RETURN NUMBER IS --Added for Fix SCR 08175 --Priyanka
 clientFileInfo VARCHAR2 (1000 CHAR);
 clientFileSize PLS_INTEGER := 0;
 withProgress BOOLEAN := FALSE;
 asynchronous BOOLEAN := FALSE;
 CLIENT_FILE_EMPTY EXCEPTION;
 clientFile VARCHAR2 (500);
 ls_ClientFile VARCHAR2 (256); 
 CLIENT_FILE_NULL EXCEPTION;
 progressTitle VARCHAR2 (1000) := NULL;
 progressSubTitle VARCHAR2 (100) := NULL;
BEGIN
 clientFile := p_ClientFile; 

 If Substr(clientFile,1,2) = '\\' Or Substr(clientFile,1,1) <> '\' Then
 ls_ClientFile := clientFile;
 ElsIf Substr(clientFile,1,1) = '\' Then
 ls_ClientFile := '\'||clientFile;
 End If; 

 -- Set up the file info
 clientFileInfo := clientFile||'|0|'||
 WEBUTIL_UTIL.BoolToStr(asynchronous,'A|','S|')||
 WEBUTIL_UTIL.BoolToStr(withProgress,'Y|','N|')||
 progressTitle||'|'||
 progressSubTitle;
 WebUtil_Core.setProperty(WebUtil_Core.WUT_PACKAGE,'WUT_FILE_INFO', clientFileInfo);
 
 -- get the size and chunk info of the client side file
 clientFileInfo := WebUtil_Core.getProperty(WebUtil_Core.WUT_PACKAGE,'WUT_FILE_INFO');
 clientFileSize := DelimStr.getNumber(clientFileInfo,1,true,'|');
 return clientFileSize;
 
 RETURN clientFileSize;
END;

RecordGroup.CUST_DCR_overridden:RecordGroupQuery:
select unique processing_cycle cycle from pl_std_airport
union
select cycle from cycle where cycle > (select max(processing_cycle) from pl_std_airport)

select navdb_id, Customer_name from navdb, customer
where navdb.navdb_id = customer.customer_ident order by navdb_id

SELECT ISSUE_CODE_DESCR,ISSUE_CODE FROM DCR_REASON_FOR_CHANGE WHERE ISSUE_CODE NOT IN
('ANA','CFD', 'CLRA', 'PLD', 'PNL', 'SDQEA', 'SDQEI', 'SDQES', 'SDQET', 'SDQJA', 'SDQJI', 'SDQJS', 'SDQJT', 'SDQLA', 'SDQLI', 'SDQLS', 'SDQLT', 'SEC', 'SLDEA', 'SLDEC', 'SLDJA', 'SLDJC', 'SLDLA', 'SLDLC'
)
ORDER BY 1

DECLARE 
 errnum NUMBER := ERROR_CODE; 
 errtxt VARCHAR2(80) := ERROR_TEXT; 
 errtyp VARCHAR2(3) := ERROR_TYPE; 
BEGIN 
 if errnum = 40202 then
 Message('Field must be entered.');
 ELSIF errnum = 50016 THEN 
 Message('Wrong data type entered.'); 
 ELSIF errnum = 40301 THEN 
 Message('Your search criteria identified no matches... Try Again.'); 
 ELSIF errnum = 40350 THEN -- no records found 
 Message('No records found matching your search criteria.');
 ELSIF errnum = 41026 THEN -- FIELD OUTPUITING
 Message('This field is calculated'); 
 ELSif errnum=41050 then -- Record has been saved already 
 Message('Record already exists.'); 
 ELSIF errnum=40100 then -- beyond first record 
 Message('You are beyond first record.');
 ELSIF errnum=40200 then -- field protected against update
 Message('Field is protected against update.');
 ELSIF errnum=40352 then -- beyond last record
 Message('You are beyond last record.');
 ELSIF errnum=40600 then -- beyond last record
 Message('Duplicate Record');
 ELSIF errnum=41009 then -- beyond last record
 null; 
 ELSIF errnum = 41051 then -- You can not create record here
 null;
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 ELSIF errnum = 40209 then 
 Dsp_Msg('Field must be a Number');
 -- End Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
 --Begin Fix SCR 7838.01 -- Venkat M -03-FEB-2019 
 ELSIF errnum = 40401 then
 null;
 --End Fix SCR 7838.01 -- Venkat M -03-FEB-2019 
 ELSE 
 message(errnum||': '||errtxt); 
 message('');
 end if; 
END;

 --Begin Fix -SCR 7519.01 --Venkat M --12-JAN-2018
 
 --End Fix -SCR 6939--Madhu --14-Mar-2016
 
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.SELECTION_CRITERIA_UPDATE = 'N' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.PROCEDURE_UPDATE = 'N' AND
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.FIXES = 'N' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.COMPANY_ROUTE_UPDATE = 'N' AND
 :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.OTHERS = 'N' 
 THEN
 DSP_MSG('Please Select at least one Data Type.');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC
 --IF :PARAMETER.BILLABLE = 1 and :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON IS NULL THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.BILLABLE_CHG_REASON IS NULL THEN
 DSP_MSG('Please Provide Billable Change Justification.');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.CHANGE_DESCR IS NULL AND :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_SECTION <> 0 THEN -- 0 means 'Not Ready'
 DSP_MSG('Please Provide Change Description.');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF;
--Begin Fix SCR 7065.01 --Madhu--31-Mar-2017 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY('DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ACTIONS',VISIBLE) = 'TRUE' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REVIEW_ACTIONS IS NULL THEN 
 display_alert.one_button('S','Review Actions','Actions cannot be blank when Final Review is not blank');
 RAISE form_trigger_failure;
 END IF; 
--End Fix SCR 7065.01 --Madhu--31-Mar-2017
 -- End Fix - SCR 6276.01 - Eswar KC 
end if; 
--Begin SCR 7230 -- Madhu -- 17-OCT-2016
 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL IS NULL THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := NVL(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.ACCEPTED_IND,'N');
 END IF;

 IF :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ACCEPTED_IND_REAL IS NULL THEN
 :DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ACCEPTED_IND_REAL := NVL(:DCR_ASSIGNMENT.QC_ACCEPTED_IND,'N');
 END IF;
--End Fix SCR 7230 --Madhu --17-OCT-2016

IF :data_change_request.reason_for_change_d IS NULL THEN 
-- DSP_MSG('PRE-COMMIT inside'); Fix - SCR 85 - VebkatReddy S - 23-Feb-2012
 BEGIN

-- Begin Fix - SCR 7264.01 - Harikrishna Ch -- 06-Nov-2017
 IF :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REQUEST_TYPE <> '001' AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.REASON_FOR_CHANGE IN ('CIR','CUR','PCE','PSE','PTE') -- Removed PPE as per SCR 7731 --Madhu
 AND :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.ORIGINAL_DCR IS NULL
 THEN
 DSP_MSG('Please provide Original DCR value.');

 END IF;

--Begin Fix SCR 0146 -- Madhu -- 12-June-2012
DECLARE
 v_dcr_number NUMBER;
 ln_upcoming_cycle NUMBER;
 ln_current_cycle NUMBER;
 ln_previous_cycle NUMBER;
 ln_curr_dcr NUMBER;
 ln_upcoming_dcr NUMBER;
 ls_Assignee VARCHAR2(30); 
 v_data_supplier Char(1); -- SCR fix 05798- Ashish N - 19-Jun-20
BEGIN
If :System.Form_Status = 'CHANGED' Then
 Commit_Form;

 -- Begin SCR 4605 - Shrikant K - 10-Oct- 2019
 IF :PARAMETER.P_NEW_DCR = 1 THEN 
 ln_curr_dcr := :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.dcr_number;
 -- Check from DCR to prompt user Y/N if user creates DCR for same NavDB, Effective Cycle & Request Type
 SELECT MAX (processing_cycle)
 INTO ln_current_cycle
 FROM pl_std_airport
 WHERE data_supplier = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.data_supplier;
 
 -- Start Fix SCR05798- Ashish N - 19-Jun-20
 BEGIN
 SELECT data_supplier 
 INTO v_data_supplier
 FROM navdb 
 WHERE navdb_id = :data_change_request.navdb_id;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 :Data_Change_Request.DATA_SUPPLIER := NULL; 
 END;
 -- End Fix SCR05798- Ashish N - 19-Jun-20
 

 ln_upcoming_cycle := Get_Future_Cycle_Fun (ln_current_cycle);
 
 v_dcr_number := ln_curr_dcr;
 
 SELECT DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL
 INTO ln_upcoming_dcr
 FROM DUAL;

 INSERT INTO DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST (DCR_NUMBER,
 REASON_FOR_CHANGE,
 CHANGE_DESCR,
 GENERATED_BY,
 GENERATED_ON,
 -- UPDATED_BY,
 -- UPDATED_ON,
 EFFECTIVITY_CYCLE,
 CREATED_BY,
 CREATED_ON,
 -- APPROVED_IND,
 -- OWNER_LOGON_ID,
 REQUEST_TYPE,
 -- AIRCRAFTS_AFFECTED,
 SELECTION_CRITERIA_UPDATE,
 -- PROCEDURE_UPDATE,
 -- COMPANY_ROUTE_UPDATE,
 -- FIXES,
 -- OTHERS,
 DATA_SUPPLIER
 -- BILLABLE_IND,
 -- BILLABLE_CHG_REASON,
 -- ORIGINAL_DCR,
 -- APOL_50_3,
 -- FINDINGS,
 -- DCR_REVIEW,
 -- REVIEW_ACTIONS,
 -- REVIEW_BY,
 -- REVIEW_ON
 )
 VALUES ( ln_upcoming_dcr,
 'RSC', --Fix SCR 05940 -Ashish N - 19-AUG-2020
 'Check Baseline- Offcycle released for previous cycle.', --Fix SCR 05940 -Ashish N - 19-AUG-2020
 -- || v_dcr_number,
 user,
 sysdate,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 ln_upcoming_cycle,
 user,
 sysdate,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 '001',
 --NULL,
 'Y',
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 v_data_supplier -- SCR fix 05798- Ashish N - 19-Jun-20
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL,
 --NULL
 ); 

 INSERT INTO NAVDB_DCR (DCR_NUMBER,
 NAVDB_ID,
 DCR_STATUS,
 CREATED_BY,
 CREATED_ON)
 VALUES (ln_upcoming_dcr,
 :data_change_request.navdb_id,
 'OPEN',
 USER,
 SYSDATE);
 
 
 SELECT CASE
 WHEN PRIMARY_FOCAL IS NULL THEN
 CASE
 WHEN SECONDARY_FOCAL IS NULL THEN 
 'AIS'
 ELSE 
 SECONDARY_FOCAL
 END
 ELSE 
 PRIMARY_FOCAL
 END
 INTO ls_Assignee
 FROM NAVDB
 WHERE navdb_id = :DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.NAVDB_ID;
 
 
 INSERT INTO DCR_ASSIGNMENT (ASSIGNED_ON,
 DCR_NUMBER,
 ASSIGNEE_LOGON_ID,
 ASSIGNED_BY,
 QC_UPDATE,
 QC_SECTION)
 VALUES (SYSDATE,
 ln_upcoming_dcr,
 ls_Assignee, --'AIS',
 USER,
 SYSDATE,
 0); 

 
 END IF; 
-- End SCR 4605 - Shrikant K - 10-Oct- 2019
 FORMS_DDL('COMMIT');
 :PARAMETER.P_NEW_DCR := 0;

 -- Begin Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC
 IF :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR = 1 THEN 
 Forms_Utilities.Copy_DCR_Attachments_Prc(:PARAMETER.P_DCR_NUMBER,:DATA_CHANGE_REQUEST.DCR_NUMBER,:GLOBAL.USERID);
 :PARAMETER.P_COPY_DCR := 0;
 END IF;
 -- End Fix - SCR 6451.01 - Eswar KC 
 IF form_success THEN -- Fix SCR 5630 -- Dass -- 11-Jul-2012
 message('Changes Saved Successfully'); 
 END IF;-- Fix SCR 5630 -- Dass -- 11-Jul-2012
End If;
--End Fix SCR 0146 -- Madhu -- 12-June-2012
END;
